special_text:
Instruct [i](Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.)[/i]
Creatures you control with one or more loyalty counters on them don't lose loyalty abilities gained from Sayuki's Instruct ability.
[+1]: Untap target creature or planeswalker. Until your next turn, it becomes a 4/4 creature and gains trample, vigilance and “Prevent all damage that would be dealt to this permanent.”
[-1]: Distribute one or two +1/+1 counters on one or two target creatures. Untap them.
